description: Enjoy this Mexican-style side dish of mashed beans with a tomato salsa overrice for a satisfying meat-free meal.
name: Refried Black Beans With Pico De Gallo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 avocado, halved, stoned, and thinly sliced (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the dried beans, onion, and garlic into a medium soup pot. Cover with water, season, and bring to the boil over a high heat. Reduce the heat and simmer, covered, for 2 hours, or until the beans turn soft. Drain the beans but reserve 250ml of the liquid.
Put the bean mixture and reserved liquid in a food processor, or use handheld blender, and blend until smooth.
In a heavy-based saucepan, heat the oil over a medium heat. Spoon the blended beans into the pan and cook, stirring frequently, for 5-6 minutes, or until thickened.
To make the pico de gallo, mix the tomatoes and onion with the coriander and lime juice. Serve the beans hot, topped with the pico de gallo, sliced avocado, and, if desired, cheese or soured cream.
